price: Perhatikanlah, bagaimana mereka membuat perbandingan-perbandingan tentang kamu, lalu sesatlah mereka; mereka tidak sanggup (mendapatkan) jalan (untuk menentang kerasulanmu).
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
